parameters: Welcome to the casino, would you like to try your luck?
Feel free to ask me any questions.
The rules of the Lucky Number game are simple: Choose a number between 1 and 10.
If your number matches the dealer’s, you win 5 times your bet!
If your number is off by 1, you win 2 times your bet.
The rules of the Higher or Lower game:
The dealer draws a card between 1 and 13.
You choose whether to bet on “Higher” or “Lower.”
The dealer draws a second card,
and if it matches your guess, your bet is doubled!
If not, you lose your wager.
The rules of the Roulette game:
Bet 100 coins, and choose either orange or blue.
The wheel spins, and the pointer determines the winner.
If the pointer lands on your chosen color, your winnings are doubled!
If you pick the wrong color, your bet is lost.
If you win, you can either continue betting for free or collect your winnings.
The prize pool is up to 1000 coins, and the game ends automatically when it hits that limit!
You’ve already claimed today’s casino dividends.
\n<Male Survivor> If I win this round...
I’ll finally have enough to buy a night with Miss Nanako...
\n<Mysterious Man> In that case, everyone will just grow comfortable with how things are...
Wanna try your luck in a high-low card game?
Something tells me today's my lucky day...
No point hesitating—let's get this started!
Guess if the next card will be higher or lower!
\..\..\....Still, something deep down is whispering to me...
You win! The current pot is \v[40] gold!
...Could it be… I might actually hit the jackpot today?
If I really win the grand prize…
Lately, \..\..\..\n[2]’s been so distant toward me…
If I could just give her a little surprise…
Maybe she’d start caring about us again…
But if she finds out I’ve been gambling…
Let’s give it one last shot—!
I keep hearing these strange noises...
I remember Inoshita mentioning it before……\|
The casino's one of those places where Kinjo messes around with women...
Is it really safe for \n[2] to be working here...?
\n<守卫>\n<Guard> I just saw Inoshita go in with one of the host girls...
: \n<Guard> Been hearing smack smack smack sounds
Heh... kinda jealous, not gonna lie...
And they’re still going at it...
Which color do you want to bet on?
The prize pool has been reset to zero.
